enterValidName: a name can't be less than 3 characters
enterValidPassword: a password can't be less than 6 characters
intro1Body: Ringler helps in effective communication between the student and the teacher in a fun and interactive way and doing academic work easily
intro2Body: We help you communicate with your students by creating your own groups and posting guizzes that are marked automatically
intro3Body: You can also post any written content, audio, video or even documents with your students and followers
intro4Body: You can follow your teachers and join groups related to your grade, and you can also get rich educational content from the best teachers
connectAndTry: You can connect to a network and try again.
alreadyRegistered: This mobile number is already registered. Alternatively, you can login.
